tickets.title: Fix the footer links please
tickets.body: The task involves fixing issues in the footer links of a web page or document. This includes identifying and correcting broken links, ensuring accuracy, and aligning with the overall navigation structure. Attention should be given to consistent formatting, responsive design, and adherence to accessibility standards. Collaboration with the design team may be needed, and updating content for relevance is essential. This aims to enhance the functionality and user-friendliness of the footer links, contributing to an overall polished user experience.

tickets.title: Implement social media integration
tickets.body: This task involves seamlessly incorporating social media functionality into the existing web page or document. Add buttons, sharing options, or feeds in a visually cohesive manner, ensuring responsiveness across devices. Collaborate with the development and design teams for a smooth integration that enhances the user experience. Pay attention to privacy and security considerations. Successful completion will result in an enriched interface that promotes increased engagement and connectivity through social media features.

tickets.title: Find out the problem with login form
tickets.body: There seems to be some sort of problem with the login form.

tickets.title: Fiz margin in the home screen
tickets.body: The home screen's margin is broken. Someone from front end should fix it.
